title: Hey guys, Nunu is finally getting a keystone.
body:
Bond of Stone
[reworked]
"Gain 5% total health.

Your crowd control effects brand enemy champions with an earthen rune for 4 seconds. Other ally champions who attack branded enemies heal for 5 + 2.5% of your maximum health over 2 seconds (halved if you are ranged)."

Works on all CC effects, including slows, blinds, grounded, etc. **
There is no cooldown or limit.**

replies.body: I dunno what you are talking about {{champion:20}} {{item:1418}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3812}} {{item:3142}}
I wonder if it counts Rylais and other item based cc.
I for one welcome our new yeti overlords
Makes me miss old support shen :(
Man, my adventures with support nunu (which already used bond because the other options don't really help) might actually become meta.

Really I think that's designed to make tank supports better and feel more impactful. Right now, Bond of Stone is a pretty big buff, but you don't notice it literally at all. However, this reworked version could be useful on Nunu outside of lane phase or in ganks. It having no cooldown or limit may be just a bit absurd, though at the same time having it have no cd or limit means that the allies that proc it are constantly refreshing the heal, meaning that it doesn't get full efficiency, though his E may be on a low enough cooldown that it doesn't matter.
